member.summary: Maximum number of seats that can be purchased. This needs to be provided only for a non-commitment plan. For a commitment plan it is decided by the contract.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Reseller.v1.Data.Seats.NumberOfSeats
member.summary: Number of seats to purchase. This is applicable only for a commitment plan.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Reseller.v1.SubscriptionsResource.Delete(System.String,System.String,Google.Apis.Reseller.v1.SubscriptionsResource.DeletionType)
member.summary: Cancels/Downgrades a subscription.
member.param: Required - Id of the subscription, which is unique for a customer
Required - Must be one of the following values [cancel, downgrade, suspend] - Whether the subscription is to be fully cancelled or downgraded

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Reseller.v1.SubscriptionsResource.DeletionType
member.summary: Whether the subscription is to be fully cancelled or downgraded

member.summary: Cancels the subscription immediately

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Reseller.v1.SubscriptionsResource.DeletionType.Suspend
member.summary: Suspends the subscriptions for 4 days before cancelling it
